text:

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
Great to see all the amazing women @UPSAirlines have working for their #AircraftMaintenance dept. With #KBOS own @crashdetective in the center of all of them. John is a fantastic advocate for highly skilled #AircraftMechanics.
#WomenInAviation #AerospaceMaintenanceComp #Aviation https://t.co/htBUHaJhQV

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
Extremely impressed by @serenawilliams diverse portfolio and her philanthropic work. Great to follow @AndrewPetcash's financial breakdown of Athletes, their wealth and portfolios.
#AthletesWealth #FinancialPortfolio #Sports #Tennis #SerenaWilliams #AnfrewPetcash https://t.co/HHuOoUtSJN

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
This gorgeous @ITAAirways livery arrived in KBOS today. Absolutely love the Savoy Blue metallic paint with the subtle designs on the tail. Indicitive of Italy's National Football Team Jersey. FCO-BOS. 
#ITAAirways #Italia #Airbus #A330 #Aviation #AvGeek #SavoyBlue #KBOS 🇮🇹 https://t.co/g1KRbbY9La

text:

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
On this the 77th. Anniversary of the #LiberationOfItaly here is 99 year old #WWIIVeteran Don Halverson of the 34th Infantry Division "Red Bull" who helped liberate Italy. @TheRifle_ author Andrew Biggio took Don back to where he fought all those years ago.
#WWII #LiberationDay 🇮🇹 https://t.co/R0UsbQDKHo

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
Today's early morning sunrise at @BostonLogan. Some days are just a little more perfect than others.

#AviationOfficer #FlyTheFriendlySkys #Sunrise https://t.co/v2yetEGCgC

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text: Stupefacente!! Another mission for 🇮🇹 #Italian #Astronaut @AstroSamantha. #MissionMinerva. #Minerva is my family name, and I'm thrilled that it is being used as the name of yet another legendary scientific mission to the @Space_Station. #SpaceX #NASA #AdAstra #GoddessMinerva #ISS https://t.co/s2Pb67DqzK

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text: 99 year old #WWIIVeteran Don Halverson is off to #Italy on @ITAAirways from @BostonLogan. He fought to liberate #Italy over 75 yrs ago and today he goes back for the anniversary. Thank you to @MassStatePolice, @TSA_NewEngland and #ITAAirways Station Manager #LucaFoltran https://t.co/F8KdKgmHcn

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
Fantastic #postcard of @BostonLogan back in the day. The iconic Terminal A serving #EasternAirlines and the old ATC Tower, are both no longer there. The roadways and upgraded terminal infrastructures look so different today.
#BostonLogan #Airports #AviationHistory 
#Ephemera #BOS https://t.co/jtlcxEDWxW

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
An amazing thread by @cathsimard_ on her creative process as a #photographer. This shows the intricate details involved in her image making. No she didn't just snap a picture, she mulled over for weeks and months where, what, and how to create her images.
#LandscapePhotographer https://t.co/2GNyLdsjGk

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
The #JetEngine. Why you ask? Because my grandmother Betty worked for Sir Frank Whittle the designer of the #JetEngine in 1939-41 in #Leicestershire, #England.
#SirFrankWhittle #JetEngine #Aviation #AviationHistory #Aircraft #AviationInnovation https://t.co/MJuj4xCagH

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text:
Today is the #126th running of the @bostonmarathon. It will be a beautiful day, so please be vigilant and cognizant of your surroundings and people. If you #SeeSomethingSaySomething. Call 911 immediately.
#StaySafe #BostonMarathon #StopTerrorism #Call911 #SuspiciousActivity https://t.co/EumqdNmEL6

author: Sam 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇮🇹🍊
text: 9 years ago, I should have been working the start of the Marathon in Hopkinton as an LEO, but I had shoulder surgery, so for the first time I was at the finish line of the Boston Marathon as a spectator. It was the most heinous experience of my life. #NeverForgotten #BostonStrong https://t.co/PEhmPbUtys
